entry.title: Haribo Zing Sour Bites Gummi Candy - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Haribo Candy
Type: Candy
Price: 19.90

Haribo - Zing Sour Bites Gummy Candy

From the sweet geniuses at the Happy World of Haribo comes an interesting twist on a new chewy candy. Haribo Sour Bites Zing Candy contains six unique and crazy flavour combinations including Blue & Red Raspberry, Lime & Lemon, Strawberry & Lemon, and  Watermelon & Red Raspberry. Prepare to delightfully entertain your tastebuds.

4.5oz.x 12bags

Haribo Zing Sour Streamers are playful gummi ribbons that make a fun and tasty treat. You'll be twisting, bending, and stretching these amazing gummy candies!

4 delicious flavours:

  • Sour Blue Raspberry
  • Sour Orange
  • Sour Apple

12x4.5 oz. bags

entry.title: Haribo Twin Snakes Gummi Candy - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Haribo Candy
Type: Candy
Price: 19.90

Haribo - Twin Snakes Gummy Candy

Happy World of Haribo Candy

Haribo Candy Since 1920

Haribo Twin Snakes Gummi Candy is the newest creation from the Happy World of Haribo!  One side of the snake is sweet and the other side is sour. Flavours include Cherry, Orange, Apple, Lemon, Blueberry and Blackcurrant.

The Original Gummy Candy company from Germany. Haribo Candy has been thrilling Candy Lovers since 1920. That's a long, but very sweet, time!

Ingredients:

Glucose syrup (from wheat or corn), sugar, gelatin, dextrose (from wheat or corn), citric acid, tartaric acid, malic acid, natural and artificial flavours, palm kernel oil, carnauba wax, white beeswax, yellow beeswax, yellow 5, red 40, blue 1.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.
